lohichchaya, mahana thema mese samahitha sitha pirisidu kalhi, diptha wu kalhi, keles nathi wu kalhi, upakkilesha paha wa giya kalhi, mrudu wu kalhi, karmakshama wu kalhi, siti kalhi, nishchala bawata path kalhi, purweniwasanusmruthi gnyanaya (=pera wusu kanda piliwela dakna nuwana) labanu pinisa sitha yomu kereyi.
